steps.description: Implement the `List` method on the `planner.Planner` struct. This method should scan the storage directory (`.smolcode/plans/`) and return a list of all plan names (filenames without the `.json` extension).
acceptance: The `List` method correctly identifies `.json` files in the storage directory.
The method returns only the base names of the files (e.g., "main", "feature-x").
Errors during directory reading are handled and returned.

steps.description: Add a `list` subcommand to the `plan` command in `cmd/smolcode/main.go`. This subcommand will call the new `planner.List` method and print the results.
acceptance: The list of plan names is printed to standard output, one name per line.
Errors from `planner.List()` are handled and logged appropriately.
A usage message for `plan list` is implemented.
